alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 25 at 1:58AM CDT until October 25 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Western Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Eastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 157 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sarepta to 6 miles north of Doyline to 13 miles south of Bossier City to 8 miles southwest of Mansfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bossier City, Minden, Mansfield, Homer, Haughton, Haynesville, Coushatta, Ringgold, Sibley, Cotton Valley, Gibsland, Sarepta, Doyline, Dixie Inn, Dubberly, Heflin, Shongaloo, Eastwood, South Mansfield and Evergreen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Red River; Webster
